page.title: 15ROADS OLD AND NEW BRIDGE
page.content: The newest road near Bridge is the Canterbury By_pass.It was built in {1983}it is a dual carriageway and it joins onto Bridge By_pass.The oldest road is the Roman road,it leads from Canterbury through Bridge to Dover.Before Bridge By_pass was built all traffic came through Bridge.We found out how much traffic uses the By_pass now.We counted for{10}minutes every hour.The average number of vehicles going to Dover was{137.}The average number of vehicles going to Canterbury in ten minutes was{156.} I found out how the children of Bridge school travel to school.{72 }come in cars,{51}walk,{41}come on either the Bekesbourne or Bishopsbourne bus,and{ {16}come by bicycle.Children have to pass their Cycling Proficiency before being allowed to ride to school.
